name: Purgatory Run
description:
A lonely bony boy is stuck in purgatory. The only way is forward, and his sole task is to not fall into the dark abyss below, otherwise he must begin his trek all over again. How far will bony boy get in this never-ending speedrun of death?

Press Space to jump.

Use Command-Q to end the game (in Mac).

Use Control-Alt-Delete, select Task Manager, and select 'Purgatory Run' to end the game (in Windows)
